Uses of Class
com.blackrook.sql.SQLConnection

Packages that use SQLConnection 
Package Description
com.blackrook.sql
Contains classes relevant to querying SQL databases.
com.blackrook.sql.util
Contains Utility classes.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SQLConnection SQLPool.getAvailableConnection()
    Retrieves an available connection from the pool.
    SQLConnection SQLPool.getAvailableConnection​(long waitMillis)
    Retrieves an available connection from the pool.
    SQLConnection SQLConnector.getConnection()
    Returns a new, opened JDBC Connection using the credentials stored with this connector.
    Methods in com.blackrook.sql with parameters of type SQLConnection 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void SQLPool.releaseConnection​(SQLConnection connection)
    Releases a connection back to the pool.

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Accepts the connection, does something with it, and returns nothing.
    R SQLConnectionFunction.apply​(SQLConnection connection)
    Accepts the connection, does something with it, and returns a result.
